title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-3.3 - Determination of physician's hours
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-3.3 - Determination of physician's hours

State Regulations

The question of the necessity of the presence of a
physician during working hours, or the availability of a physician at stated
hours should be determined by an inspection of the plant to ascertain the
nature of the hazards and the frequency of accidents. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
325-3.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
